entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who has Blast-Ended Skrewts.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as being severely shaken and having his robe smoking.

entities.name: skrewts
entities.description: Skrewts are described as enormous and Blast-Ended.

relationships.description: Cedric was attacked by the skrewts.
